message: This is a high-quality product worth $2000000. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, a 50% discount. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on a great deal.

Alice, thank you for the opportunity. Given the value and the discount, I believe this is a wise investment. I'm ready to proceed with the purchase.
